prompt: Create a glassmorphism pricing card with 3 tiers (Basic, Pro, Enterprise). Make it look premium.
expectations: Background uses rgba with low alpha (under 0.3) for glass effect
A vivid gradient or dark background is present behind the glass elements
Border uses rgba white for the glass edge
Hover effects are present on buttons or cards
Text is white or near-white for legibility

prompt: Build a glassmorphism login form with email, password fields and a sign in button. Dark theme.
expectations: backdrop-filter blur is present on the form panel
Input fields have glass styling (rgba background, no opaque fill)
Background has gradient or orb elements behind the glass
Form has entry animation or transition
Button has hover state with glow or lift effect

prompt: Make a glassmorphism dashboard navbar with logo, nav links, and a CTA button.
expectations: Navbar background is translucent (rgba), not opaque
Border is only on bottom of navbar
CTA button has distinct glass or glow styling
